import React,{useEffect}from'react';const SidebarToggle=()=>{useEffect(()=>{// Remove the Healthcare Assistant header
const header=document.querySelector('.chat-header');if(header){header.style.display='none';}// Create sidebar toggle button
const mainContent=document.querySelector('.chat-container');const sidebar=document.querySelector('.sidebar');// Create toggle button
const toggleButton=document.createElement('button');toggleButton.innerHTML='☰';// Hamburger menu icon
toggleButton.className='sidebar-toggle';toggleButton.setAttribute('aria-label','Toggle Sidebar');// Insert toggle button
document.body.appendChild(toggleButton);// Add toggle functionality
toggleButton.addEventListener('click',function(){if(sidebar){sidebar.classList.toggle('collapsed');mainContent.classList.toggle('expanded');}});// Cleanup function
return()=>{if(toggleButton&&toggleButton.parentNode){toggleButton.parentNode.removeChild(toggleButton);}};},[]);return null;};export default SidebarToggle;
